main_choice.title: your choise to earn more
main_choice.description: Choise.com is a MetaFi (CeFi/DeFi) ecosystem based on Crypterium CeFi solutions and Charism DeFi protocol, that reinvents how protocols operate with CeFi, reduces commisions up to 50 times and unlocks crosschain high yield to 100 mln CeFi users

main_rendering.title: grand rebranding
main_rendering.description: Choise.com is the next step in Crypterium evolution. With all new DeFi possibilities added by the launch of Charism platform, we introduce our new MetaFi vision of your all_in_one crypto wallet.

list.text: Multi_chain support allows the user to keep more than one crypto asset (Ethereum, Solana, Tron, BSC, etc)
Itâ€™s easy to use even for beginners and allows them to get full support from the Choise.com team
Includes a built_in Web3 browser that allows users to explore DApps seamlessly and safely
Eliminates third parties between users and crypto. Only users has full control over their funds
With our wallet, users can earn interest on crypto, play blockchain games and access the latest DApps, DeFi platforms (Staking, Farming) and NFTs

main_defi.title: DeFi protocols aggregator
main_defi.description: A single simplified access to most available protocols which allows profit maximization via yield farming and staking additional APY from intelligent wealth management service based on CHO incentivisation
